outline:
1. to stop, cease, desist, forego, cease to be, leave undone, forbear
    1. (Qal)
      1. to cease, come to an end
      2. to cease, leave off
kjv_def: cease, end, fall, forbear, forsake, leave (off), let alone, rest, be unoccupied, want.
strongs_def: properly, to be flabby, i.e. (by implication) desist; (figuratively) be lacking or idle
